title: New VanHelsing Ransomware-as-a-Service Hits Windows, Linux, BSD, ARM and ESXi

content.raw: A sophisticated new ransomware operation dubbed VanHelsing has emerged as a rapidly expanding threat in the cybercriminal landscape. First observed on March 7, 2025, this operation functions as a Ransomware-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform, licensing its destructive capabilities to affiliated threat actors and demonstrating alarming speed in scaling attacks across diverse infrastructure platforms.
